response.overview: Hannah and Frazier are two high power attorneys living in Tallahassee, Florida. They are not in a good place and are feeling estranged. They've spent their 1st 5 years of marriage with each other's families for Christmas and this year they decide to fly to Chicago for Christmas to avoid their families seeing them in the state they are in. They are both feeling like that would be their last Christmas together. On their way to the airport they text messages that their flight have been canceled. Determined to get to their destination and the only flight out is through Macon. They decide to drive to Macon and on their way they run into car trouble and find out they will be stranded in Albany, GA. While staying in a Bed and Breakfast they learn the true meaning of Christmas and learn what matters the most.
response.title: The Holiday Inn
